trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> expressed in minutes or as a standard infinite time span.
trans-unit.target: 将一个转换<xref:System.TimeSpan>以分钟为单位表示或作为一种标准无限时间 span.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: This type, like all the other configuration converter types, converts strings found in the configuration file to and from the related strongly typed properties.
trans-unit.target: 这种类型，如所有其他配置转换器类型，将在配置文件与相关的强类型属性中找到的字符串转换。

trans-unit.source: In particular, the TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter class converts <xref:System.String> minutes, assigned to a configuration property, to <xref:System.TimeSpan> minutes and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 具体而言，将转换 TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter 类<xref:System.String>分钟，为分配给配置属性，<xref:System.TimeSpan>分钟，反之亦然。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: If the configuration property has a <xref:System.String> value of "infinite", it converts this value to <xref:System.TimeSpan> and vice versa.
trans-unit.target: 如果配置属性具有<xref:System.String>的"无限"的值，它将转换到此值<xref:System.TimeSpan>，反之亦然。</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The infinite <xref:System.TimeSpan> value is represented by the <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> enumeration value.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Configuration.TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter"></xref> class.
Normally, you use the converter types provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: 通常情况下，你使用由系统提供的转换器类型。

trans-unit.source: The only time you need to use the TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter constructor is when you create your own conversion type.
trans-unit.target: 创建你自己的转换类型时需要使用 TimeSpanMinutesOrInfiniteConverter 构造函数的唯一时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.String> to a <xref:System.TimeSpan>.

The system uses the ConvertFrom method when reading from a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.String> value to <xref:System.TimeSpan>, or the <xref:System.String> "infinite" to <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用 ConvertFrom 方法从配置文件读取数据时将转换<xref:System.String>值赋给<xref:System.TimeSpan>，或<xref:System.String>"无限"到<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>。</xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> </xref:System.String> </xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
The <xref:System.String> object to convert.
The , if the data parameter is the "infinite"; otherwise, the representing the data parameter in minutes.
trans-unit.target: ，如果 data 参数是"无限"; 否则为表示 data 以分钟为单位的参数。

trans-unit.source: Converts a <xref:System.TimeSpan> to a <xref:System.String>.
The system uses the ConvertTo method when writing to a configuration file to convert a <xref:System.TimeSpan> value or <xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue> to a <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 系统使用 ConvertTo 方法写入到配置文件时将<xref:System.TimeSpan>值或<xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue>到<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String></xref:System.TimeSpan.MaxValue></xref:System.TimeSpan>转换

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.ComponentModel.ITypeDescriptorContext"></xref> object used for type conversions.
The <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object used during conversion.
The value to convert.
The conversion type.
The "infinite", if the value parameter is ; otherwise, the representing the value parameter in minutes.
trans-unit.target: "无限"，如果 value 参数是; 否则为表示 value 以分钟为单位的参数。
